Record.ClassificationPath: Male Urogenital Diseases/Urologic Diseases/Kidney Diseases/Renal Insufficiency/Renal Insufficiency, Acute
Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Female Urogenital Diseases/Urologic Diseases/Kidney Diseases/Renal Insufficiency/Renal Insufficiency, Acute
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: Conditions in which the function of KIDNEYS deteriorates suddenly in a matter of days or even hours. It is characterized by the sudden drop in GLOMERULAR FILTRATION RATE; (GMR). The most severe stage is when the GFR drops below 15 ml per min (ACUTE KIDNEY FAILURE).
